content: make this beautiful crochet maple leaf and bring the beauty of fall indoors no raking required you can scatter them as a decorative accent on your thanksgiving table string several together to make a festive garland or attach a single leaf as decoration on a hostess gift **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 300 patterns and over 300 video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/the-crochet-club/ ref=ravelry > please add the pattern to your raverly favorites
